div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Composition` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `Composition`. Element `Composition` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition`.
Element `Composition.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.meta`.
Element `Composition.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.implicitRules`.
Element `Composition.language` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.language`.
Element `Composition.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.text`.
Element `Composition.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.contained`.
Element `Composition.url` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Composition`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Composition.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.identifier`.
Element `Composition.version` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Composition`, but has no target element specified.

Note that the target element context `Composition.status` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `Composition.status` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.status`.
Element `Composition.type` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.type`.
Element `Composition.category` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.category`.
Element `Composition.category` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `Composition.class`.
Element `Composition.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.subject`.
Element `Composition.encounter` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.encounter`.
Element `Composition.date` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.date`.
Element `Composition.useContext` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Composition`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Composition.author` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.author`.
Element `Composition.name` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Composition`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Composition.title` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.title`.
Element `Composition.note` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Composition`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Composition.attester` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.attester`.
Element `Composition.attester.mode` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.attester.mode`.
Element `Composition.attester.time` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.attester.time`.
Element `Composition.attester.party` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.attester.party`.
Element `Composition.custodian` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.custodian`.
Element `Composition.relatesTo` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.relatesTo`.
Element `Composition.relatesTo` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 structure `Composition`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Composition.event` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.event`.
Element `Composition.event.period` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.event.period`.
Element `Composition.event.detail` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.event.detail`.
Element `Composition.section` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.section`.

Element `Composition.section.title` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Composition.section` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `Composition.section.title` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.section.title`.

Element `Composition.section.code` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Composition.section` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `Composition.section.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.section.code`.

Element `Composition.section.author` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Composition.section` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `Composition.section.author` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.section.author`.

Element `Composition.section.author` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Composition.section` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `Composition.section.author` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `Composition`, but has no target element specified.

Element `Composition.section.focus` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Composition.section` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `Composition.section.focus` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.section.focus`.

Element `Composition.section.focus` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Composition.section` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `Composition.section.focus` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `Composition`, but has no target element specified.

Element `Composition.section.text` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Composition.section` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `Composition.section.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.section.text`.

Element `Composition.section.orderedBy` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Composition.section` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `Composition.section.orderedBy` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.section.orderedBy`.

Element `Composition.section.entry` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Composition.section` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `Composition.section.entry` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.section.entry`.

Element `Composition.section.emptyReason` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Composition.section` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `Composition.section.emptyReason` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.section.emptyReason`.

Element `Composition.section.section` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Composition.section` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `Composition.section.section` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Composition.section.section`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
